ClickBank is a secure online retail outlet for more than 50,000 digital products and 100,000 active affiliate marketers.
The Web's Most Trusted Digital Marketplace

Founded in 1998, ClickBank is a secure online retail outlet for more than 50,000 digital products and 100,000 active affiliate marketers.

ClickBank makes a sale somewhere in the world every three seconds, safely processing more than 30,000 digital transactions a day. We serve more than 200 countries, and are consistently ranked as one of the most highly-trafficked sites on the web.

ClickBank is privately held with offices in Broomfield, Colorado and Boise, Idaho. Click Sales Inc. is a subsidiary of Keynetics Inc. All products and services offered by Keynetics or its subsidiaries are subject to the ClickBank Legal Notice.

ClickBank allows you to list standard and recurring products for sale. Standard products, like ebooks or instructional videos, are available for one-time purchase. Conversely, recurring products and services, like membership sites, provide ongoing value. Both types of products require a Thank You Page.
This is where your site data would be and where you would come to edit it.

Welcome to the ClickBank Help Center, where we have all the information you need to get started as a ClickBank affiliate or vendor. Browse the articles below or use the search box above to find the information you need.

Manage your contracts with vendors and affiliates.
Why you should pay us more for Contracts

ClickBank is not a chartered bank or trust company, or depository institution. ClickBank is not authorized to accept
deposits or trust accounts and is not licensed or regulated by any state or federal banking authority.

ClickBank is dedicated to providing the highest levels of customer service. If you need assistance please submit an online support ticket to our customer service department by clicking on one of the categories below.

Our customer service department is available to assist you Monday through Friday from 7:00 a.m. through 6:00 p.m. (Mountain Time).

Customer Service Tools

Please do not submit the same question through each of the different forms. This will only cause a delay in our response to you.

Customer Questions
Purchase Questions
Do you need assistance with a purchase that you made through ClickBank or with a charge that appears on your statement from ClickBank?
Vendor and Affiliate Questions
Vendor and Affiliate Questions

Business Development

If you'd like information on becoming a ClickBank Partner.

For the most prompt service, please use the forms above. To help us answer all of our clients and customers as quickly as possible, be sure to only submit one email per inquiry.

If you have problems with the forms above, you may contact us via fax or traditional mail. Please be sure to include the following information with your fax or mail so that we can contact you with the most complete answer possible: your first and last name and an email address AND phone number. If you are a customer, please also include your ClickBank order number. If you are a vendor or an affiliate, please include your ClickBank username.

To reach us by fax, please dial: 1-559-210-0502.

To reach us by mail, please use the following address:

Click Sales Inc 
917 S. Lusk Street, Suite 200
Boise ID 83706 USA

You can conveniently search the ClickBank legal and policy documents by using the categories below.

Please select the legal or policy category you are looking for:

  • Client Contract
  • Privacy
  • Accounting
  • Security
  • Network Abuse
  • DMCA and Trademark Policy
  • Vendor and Products Requirements Policy
  • Return and Cancellation Policy
  • Legal

If you can't find the information you desire fill out a service request form and an account representative will assist you. The service request forms can be located in the "Contact Us" area of the site.

Privacy Policies

The following privacy statements address our information collection practices with respect to certain types of information that we receive:

  • The Client Privacy Policy addresses the types of information gathered through this website, www.clickbank.com, from vendors and affiliates. It also addresses how we collect, use, and disclose personally identifiable information.
  • The Customer Privacy Policy addresses the types of information gathered through this website, www.clickbank.com and www.clickbank.net (where the order form resides), from customers when a purchase is made. It also addresses how we collect, use, and disclose personally identifiable information.

CONTACT (Press Inquiries Only):
PR/Media Request
